actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: A bill to designate United States Route 22 By-Pass in Weirton, West Virginia, as part of the Interstate System under section 139(b) of title 23, United States Code.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation, upon request by the State of West Virginia, to enter into an agreement with such State providing for the designation of United States Route 22 By-Pass in Weirton, West Virginia, as a future part of the Interstate System.

titles.title: A bill to designate United States Route 22 By-Pass in Weirton, West Virginia, as part of the Interstate System under section 139(b) of title 23, United States Code.
